pages.text: Unlike your other gemstones, $(thing)Amethyst$() seems to have the ability to power spell casting wands. While this ability has broken your brain more than once, the results are impressive.$(br)What more is there?

pages.title: Edified Leaves Crushing
pages.text: Hexcasters are seemingly unable to identify minerals other than Amethyst. $(thing)Clearly$() these cyan-coloured leaves have the essence of $(thing)Topaz$()...

pages.title: Edified Leaves Crafting
pages.text: By infusing $(thing)Leaves$() with $(thing)Amethyst$(), $(thing)Citrine$() or $(thing)Topaz$(), you get out glistening, colorful $(thing)Gemstone Leaves$(), from your $(l:general/colored_trees)Colored Trees$(). Intriguingly different, yet familiar.

pages.title: Charging Amethyst
pages.text: You can charge up Amethyst Shards using the $(l:general/fusion_shrine)Fusion Shrine$().

pages.title: Brewing Potions
pages.text: As you expected, $(thing)Charged Amethyst$() serves as a more potent, but also more fluctuate, $(thing)Amethyst$() reagent in regards to prolonging effect durations.
